oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified group of Confederate and Union veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified group of Confederate and Union Civil War veterans. Samuel Wallace Duncan, Co. M, 7th Penn., Vol. Cav. Regt., USA, is seated, second from the right. Duncan served throughout the Atlanta Campaign and through the end of the war. He relocated to; Chattanooga afer the war and served as a city alderman in the late 1890s.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Duncan, Samuel Wallace
